answerText: Herzog [10] Herzog was written by this author of The Adventures of Augie March.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Harvard | 19 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Just out of his second divorce, the title character writes letters to Eisenhower and Nietzsche, as well as his ex-wife Madeleine. For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this novel, whose title character briefly considers killing Madeleine and Valentine to take custody of his daughter Junie.
